mean_cn: vi. 立下标准；制定标准；  vt. 使合乎标准；使标准化
mean_en: to change (things) so that they are similar and consistent and agree with rules about what is proper and acceptable
word_etyma: standard标准 + ize动词：使 → standardize 使标准化
sentence: The factory standardized the shape of the products on the conveyor belt.
sentence_trans: 工厂对传送带上的产品的形状进行标准化加工。
